com.k2.Proforma.Proforma

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Proforma Proforma.add(java.lang.Object... parts)
      Add a line to the proforma comprising the given parts in order
      Proforma Proforma.addIf(com.k2.Expressions.expression.Expression<java.lang.Boolean> conditionalExpression, java.lang.Object... parts)
      This method add a conditional line to the proforma A conditional line is only included in the output if the given boolean expression evaluated to true
      Proforma Proforma.includeIf(com.k2.Expressions.expression.Expression<java.lang.Boolean> conditionalExpression) 
      Proforma Proforma.setAutoIncrementIndent(boolean autoIncrementIndent)
      Identifies that this proforma should automatically increase the given indent
      Proforma Proforma.setEmbedded(boolean embedded)
      Identifies that this proforma is embedded Embedded proformas omit the indent on the first line and the carriage return on the last line
      Proforma Proforma.with(Parameter<?> valueSourceParameter)
      Create a clone of this proforma setting the parameter that will provide the object from which this proforma will derive its values
